settings.title: What Skin Types Are Your Products Suitable For?
settings.answer:
MIRACO Beauty is formulated with all skin types in mind, even sensitive. However, we understand that some people may have allergies to even natural ingredients therefore, we suggest checking our ingredient labels. As a rule of thumb, we recommend doing a patch test with any products before using them.

If pregnant or breastfeeding, we recommend consulting with your doctor. Although we don't formulate with retinol, we use active ingredients (AHAs and BHAs in the S-Cell Super Cream). We include the full list of ingredients on every product page for full transparency.

If further assistance is needed, do not hesitate to email any questions to inquiry@miracobeauty.com

settings.title: Pseudoalteromonas Ferment Extract Is Used in Most of Your Products, Can You Explain Why?
settings.answer:
Pseudoalteromonas Ferment Extract is a marine-rich microorganism with several benefits including natural bioactive properties. Derived from the Antarctic’s extremely cold ocean, it prevents cutaneous dryness and is efficacious against cold weather while protecting the skin. It’s one of our main ingredients used in our products due to its ability to maintain hydration, add moisture and protect the skin.

1% Antarcticine (the trade name for the diluted version of the Pseudoalteromonas Ferment Extract) cream increased skin hydration by 14.8% in cold weather and 5% decreased the depth of wrinkles by 44% around the eyes.

settings.title: Do You Test On Animals?
settings.answer: No, we do not test our formulas on animals.

settings.title: Are Your Products Vegan?
settings.answer: We carry vegan and non-vegan products. Please see each product page for more information.

settings.title: Are MIRACO Beauty’s Products Gluten-Free?
settings.answer: Our products are gluten-free however may not be manufactured in a gluten-free facility. We recommend doing a patch test with any products before using them.

settings.title: Where Else Are MIRACO Beauty’s Products Sold?
settings.answer: MIRACO Beauty is sold on our website and authorized medical spas in the USA. Additionally, MIRACO Beauty is also sold on www.miracobeauty.com.hk to service our customers in Hong Kong, Macau and China.

settings.title: Can I Sell MIRACO Beauty Products On My Own Site?
settings.answer: No. Your purchase of MIRACO Beauty products are for personal use. By purchasing MIRACO Beauty products, you agree not to resell or distribute such products for any commercial purposes and agree to our terms and conditions. We may reject or cancel an order if we have reason to believe that your order is not for your personal use.

settings.title: When Will My Order Ship?
settings.answer:
Enjoy free standard shipping with USPS on orders totaling $50 or more, applicable to all 48 states (excluding Hawaii, Puerto Rico, U.S. Virgin Islands, American Samoa, and Alaska). Your order will be processed, and standard shipping delivery will follow.

Please note: We do ship to Hawaii, Guam, Marshall Islands, Northern Mariana Islands, Palau, Puerto Rico, Virgin Islands, Armed Forces Americas, Armed Forces Europe, and Armed Forces Pacific. However, additional postage and fees will be incurred.

Delivery with standard shipping will occur within 5 – 7 business days once your order has been processed and shipped.

This excludes shipping to P.O. Boxes.

settings.title: Do You Accept An Order Shipping To A P.O. Box?
Do You Offer International Shipping?
settings.answer: Yes, we do offer international shipping; however, postage fees will be calculated and applied during the checkout process.

settings.title: My Order Shipped But I Need To Change My Address?
settings.answer: Once your order has shipped, we won’t be able to stop shipment. Please update your account information on our website and email us at inquiry@miracobeauty.com to verify the new address is updated.

settings.title: How Do I Cancel My Order?
settings.answer: Once your order has shipped, we won’t be able to stop shipment. Please update your account information on our website and email us at inquiry@miracobeauty.com to verify the new address is updated.

settings.title: Can I Return Or Exchange An Item?
settings.answer:
If you are not completely satisfied with your MIRACO Beauty purchase, please contact via email at inquiry@miracobeauty.com with your first and last name, order number, and reason for return within 30 days of your purchase. Please click here Returns and Exchanges Instructions for step by step instructions regarding your order. 

Please note that Miraco Beauty eGift Cards cannot be returned or exchanged.

settings.title: Questions Or Feedback About Something Else?
settings.answer: Feel free to email us at inquiry@miracobeauty.com or DM us on social media!
